posts.title: Stuff White People Like Book
posts.content: Study the white man and learn of his rich and mysterious culture by reading the “Stuff White People Like” book. The book will provide you detailed information on things white people like such as: sandwiches, leashes on children, hazing <del>and slavery</del>.

posts.title: The Ultimate Cooler
posts.content: Step into the future with this incredibly re-designed ultimate cooler. This all-in-one cooler comes built with everything you can possibly need outdoors from a blender, to a charging dock and built-in speakers you can connect to via Bluetooth.

posts.title: Fortune Telling Beer Glass
posts.content: Those who say that you won’t find any answers at the bottom of the glass clearly never drank out of this fortune telling beer glass. Each 27 ounce cup is crafted from durable food-safe plastic and comes with a built-in fortune teller with 20 different fortunes.

posts.title: Music For Cats
posts.content: Unlike humans that only use 3% of their brain for hearing, cats devote an astounding 25%. Music for cats was created by a professional musician using state of the art equipment that is scientifically proven to elicit positive reactions and enrich their lives.

posts.title: Tactical Backpack
posts.content: Stay prepared for any situation you encounter in the great outdoors by packing all the gear you could ever need into the tactical backpack. This heavy duty pack features a unique M.O.L.L.E strap system that allows you to wear your equipment rather than carry it.

posts.title: Hot Dog Pet Bed
posts.content: Keep your little furball in total comfort while they lounge around the house by getting them this comfy hot dog pet bed. This adorable little hot dog shaped bed sports two soft and fluffy bun cushions in addition to a removable and washable cushion.

posts.title: Skull Bowling Ball
posts.content: Crush your enemies and hear the lamentation of their women at the local bowling alley while using this intimidating skull bowling ball. With a frightening design, bowling pins will instantly knock over in mortal fear before you even launch the ball down the lane.

posts.title: Drawing Without Dignity Party Game
posts.content: Drawing Without Dignity is like the uncensored and naughty version of Pictionary. In this crass, crude, and hysterical drawing game for adults, players take turns drawing dirty pictures from 1 of the 670 inappropriate topics displayed on the cards.

posts.title: Ostrich Pillow
posts.content: Take a nap at school, in the office, or even while traveling by using this ostrich pillow. The ostrich pillow takes napping to new frontiers, allowing you to comfortably block out external light, giving you some much needed privacy while you doze off.

posts.title: Cat Hammock Activity Center
posts.content: Transform your plain walls into a fun playground for your feline friends using this cat hammock activity center. It features a series of canvas hammocks, small wooden planks, and a large sisal rope pole that will keep your kitty entertained for hours on end.

posts.title: The 12-Person 3-Room Camping Tent
posts.content: With the 12-person 3-room camping tent you’ll be able to enjoy quality outdoor time with the family without feeling like you’re constantly on top of each other. It sets up in just under 2 minutes and features a well distributed layout that allows for maximum privacy.

posts.title: Penis Soap
posts.content: Experience a hole new level of cleanliness by giving your unit a thorough cleaning using this penis soap. The design features a one-size-fits-most hole you insert your penis into so you can receive an extensive and stimulating cleansing.
